field.label: Parent
field.help: Choose the members that will be used for the link aggregation

field.label: Proto
field.help: The protocol to use, please refer to the documentation for a detailed explanation of the various types available

field.label: Fast timeout
field.help: Enable lacp fast-timeout on the interface.

field.label: Use flowid
field.help: Use the RSS hash from the network card if available, otherwise a hash is locally calculated. The default depends on the system tunable in net.link.lagg.default_use_flowid.

field.label: Hash Layers
field.help: Set the packet layers to hash for aggregation protocols which load balance.

field.label: Use strict
field.help: Enable lacp strict compliance on the interface. The default depends on the system tunable in net.link.lagg.lacp.default_strict_mode.

field.label: MTU
field.help: If you leave this field blank, the smallest mtu of this laggs children will be used.

field.label: Description
field.help: You may enter a description here for your reference (not parsed).
